name: Sci-Fight (kuryer)
description:
Sci-Fight is a 2D shooter with pixel art graphics where your goal is to survive upcoming waves of enemies. 

There are 3 types of guns: pistol, shotgun or uzi. Every gun is different, but what they all have in common is that they sometimes run out of ammo. To properly reload your gun, you have to face a quick skill check.

During the battle you have to use your both flair and skill - things that in-game mechanics do reward.    

Good luck and have fun in Sci-Fight.
